posts.post_content:
Free s/h.  Payment:  Paypal gift preferred; Paypal goods please add 3%.  Check/MO fine. 
“I’ll take it” will take precedent over ongoing correspondences.

***** PLEASE ***** Correspondence ONLY to – [url]mybuddyinc@yahoo.com[/url]

Bresnahan, mouth closed, SGC 55 – 200


[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=392352&d=1586028958[/IMG]
Collins, mouth closed , SGC 45 – 200
Oldring (slight crack in slab), SGC 70 – 115

I’ll take the Bender and Doc White. Thanks!
